tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  RESPECTED
comments: Professor Terzian was a great teacher. if you ask a question he answers promptly. He grades your work in a timely fashion. He provided good fed back to work posted by his students. I would definitely take him again..

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: not very clear and way too much reading considering there were only 5 questions on weekly quiz. Did not see the importance of the questions. take someone else if you are trying to get an A

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Every week there\'s a chapter to read, a 20 minute quiz (5 questions) that is due Friday 11:59pm, & a paper due Sunday by 11:59pm. We did have work to do but we did learn a lot also. Professor Terzian wants you to learn the material, so if you\'re ready to do the work, take his class. I did walk away with an "A", but I worked hard for it.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: 99% of this class is centered on taking insight of your life course & understanding it Therefore, you get your credits & 14 weeks of counseling! Professor Terzan is well-respected in his field, & I\'m glad I had the chance to learn from him. We had a chapter, a quiz, & a paper every week, so be ready to think. Terzian is a high quality professor.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I was really interested in this course & I learned a lot about myself. If you\'re not ready to dig deep into self-reflection, then this class, with THIS instructor in not for you. We had a chapter to read, a quiz, and a paper every week....I was busy!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He was amazing. He was very fair and the class was interesting. He was extremely helpful and understanding. The assignments werent too hard and as long as you read the book you can pass the class with an easy A. I highly recommend him. taking this class has enhanced my interest in the field of study.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: No passion for is work. He just goes through the motions and does not engage.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Nice guy overall,but not for someone entering the helping profession. His ideas contradict the 12 step recovery program and challenge the existence of a higher power which the 12 step program is dependant then tries to make everything a religious debate. This teacher is much older than the other professors and his ideas are outdated and far fetched
